SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bool
Bool Class inherits from Variable class.
Colorj
The Colorj is used to manage the color of cursors.
Cursor
The Cursor Class contains the attributes used to describe a Cursor (drawing pen) and the methods used in the Interpreter Class to execute the user's instructions.
FileException
This Exception is thrown when the execution of a file goes wrong.
Interface
The Interface Class is the main class of the program, it manages the canvas (drawing area), the cursors, the writing area for the user to type instructions, the history and the buttons.
Interpreter
The Interpreter Class manages the instructions entered by the user.
LoopSyntaxException
This Exception is thrown when the interpreter identifies an incorrect syntax inside a loop
MapCursor
MapCursor is used to stock in a HashMap and manage all the cursors available.
MapVariable
MapVariable is used to stock in a HashMap and manage all the variables created.
MimicException
This Exception is thrown when the execution of a MIMIC command goes wrong
MirrorException
This Exception is thrown when the execution of a MIRROR command goes wrong
NewCursorException
This Exception is thrown when creating a new cursor.
Num
Num Class inherits from Variable class.
OutOfPositionException
This Exception is thrown when a cursor is sent out of the drawing Pane.
Percentage
The Percentage Class manages the percentages.
Str
Str Class inherits from Variable class.
UndefinedVariableException
This Exception is throws when an undefined variable is used inside an instruction.
UnknownCommand
This Exception is thrown when an incorrect instruction is being executed
Variable
This Class is used to create variables.
